fields.title: Kudya – Africa’s Marketplace & Super App
fields.description:
Kudya: Transforming How Africa Shops, Eats, and Connects

Kudya is Africa’s first true super app, connecting buyers and sellers across food, goods, and services. Our team handled the full digital ecosystem: branding, mobile & web apps, payments, logistics, and multi-language support. Kudya has become a benchmark for digital commerce in Africa, enabling hundreds of businesses and thousands of users daily.

  • Custom e-commerce engine
  • Integrated delivery logistics
  • Secure wallet/payments
  • Vendor & customer dashboards
  • Multi-country, multi-language

Built with Django, React Native, Stripe, and AWS.

fields.title: Family Cladding – Home Makeover Platform
fields.description:
Family Cladding: Elevate Your Space, Effortlessly

Family Cladding is a modern B2C and B2B platform for the cladding and home-improvement sector. We developed a sleek, visual site that allows customers to browse cladding solutions, request quotes, and book installations in a few clicks. The admin dashboard helps Family Cladding manage leads, projects, and customer feedback with ease.

  • Elegant gallery and product showcases
  • Custom project inquiry forms
  • Automated quote generator
  • SEO & Google Ads integration

Stack: Django, Next.js, Postgres, Tailwind CSS.

fields.title: TBAE – Team Building Africa Events
fields.description:
TBAE: Leading Team Building Events in Africa

TBAE is the continent’s top team-building company, and we completely re-imagined their digital experience. From instant booking and payment to an interactive event gallery, the new site delivers a world-class user journey for corporates and individuals. Our work helped TBAE triple their lead volume and streamline event management.

  • Custom booking engine
  • Dynamic event galleries
  • Client dashboard with calendar sync
  • Review & testimonial system

Stack: Django, Next.js, React, Stripe, Metabase analytics.

fields.title: DEbarn – Venue, School & WiFi Hotspot Platform
fields.description:
DEbarn: Smart Venue, School & WiFi Management

DEbarn transforms how venues, schools, and event organizers manage spaces and guest connectivity. Our cloud platform lets clients book facilities, schedule school activities, and securely offer WiFi to guests, all from one dashboard. Real-time analytics help owners maximize usage and revenue, while guests enjoy seamless access.

  • One-click venue booking & calendar
  • School timetables and notifications
  • Automated guest WiFi codes
  • Usage analytics and admin controls

Trusted by top schools and event venues in Southern Africa.

fields.title: Ghanadude – Pan-African Lifestyle Media
fields.description:
Ghanadude: Redefining African Pop Culture Online

Ghanadude is a dynamic blog, community, and store for African pop culture and lifestyle. We built a scalable platform with viral content features, influencer dashboards, and a merch store. Ghanadude now reaches millions of users across the continent and diaspora, supporting cultural pride and new talent.

  • Multi-author CMS
  • Viral social sharing tools
  • Online shop for merchandise
  • Event ticketing integration

Stack: Django, Next.js, Paystack, Google Analytics.

fields.title: Case Study: EdTech for Rural Africa – Mlimi Learning
fields.description:
Mlimi Learning: Bridging the Education Gap

Mlimi Learning brings digital education to remote villages. We built an offline-first learning app with curriculum tracking, teacher dashboards, and WhatsApp-based support. The result: 20% higher pass rates and thousands of rural students with digital skills.

  • Offline & low-bandwidth features
  • Curriculum alignment for multiple countries
  • Parent & teacher communication tools

Stack: Django, React Native, Twilio API.

fields.title: Case Study: FinTech Success – MobiCash Africa
fields.description:
MobiCash: Financial Access for All

We helped MobiCash Africa launch a mobile wallet that allows anyone to send, receive, and pay securely with their phone—no bank required. Our custom KYC onboarding, agent management, and security modules powered their rapid growth to 50,000+ users in 18 months.

  • Bank-grade security
  • Agent & merchant portal
  • API integrations for bill payments

Stack: Django, Flutter, REST API, AWS.

fields.title: Case Study: HealthTech Platform – Tembhalethu Men’s Clinic
fields.description:
Tembhalethu Men’s Clinic: Digital Health Redefined

We digitized bookings, patient records, and reminders for Tembhalethu Men’s Clinic. Our platform improved client retention and reduced no-shows by 30% within six months.

  • Secure patient portal
  • SMS & WhatsApp reminders
  • Doctor dashboard & telehealth integration

Stack: Django, React, Nexmo API.

fields.title: Case Study: E-commerce – African Rise
fields.description:
African Rise: Selling African Products Worldwide

African Rise connects artisans, brands, and customers globally. We built a robust multi-vendor marketplace with local delivery, international shipping, and automated currency conversion. African Rise now empowers dozens of African brands with global sales and easy digital marketing.

  • Vendor onboarding & store setup
  • Secure payments & payouts
  • Marketing automation & analytics

Stack: Django, Next.js, Stripe, DHL API.

fields.title: Case Study: Logistics Platform – QuickMove Africa
fields.description:
QuickMove: Next-Gen Logistics & Courier Tech

We powered QuickMove Africa with a full-stack logistics platform: instant booking, driver tracking, automated invoicing, and real-time notifications. This tech leap reduced delivery errors by 45% and boosted client satisfaction for their B2B partners.

  • Driver & client portals
  • GPS tracking
  • Instant quote engine

Stack: Django, React Native, Google Maps API.
